line_1: My Lord, in usual taste, began to yawn,
line_2: The King gone round, my Lady too withdrawn,

line_1: The Youth began as 'twere to yawn;
line_2: For now, when near the Morning's Dawn,
The starry host put back the dawn,

line_1: In mood and figure at the helm to yawn,
line_2: By slow degrees, and course of office, drawn

line_1: Cramm'd to the throat, in lazy plenty yawn)
line_2: Condemn'd (whilst proud, and pamper'd Sons of Lawn,

line_1: Incorrigibly deaf, I feign a yawn;
line_2: And mock their just conclusions, ere they're drawn.
